name: lemon peel stitch square
notes:
introduction to the lemon peel stitch in a practice square that makes a great washcloth when worked in worsted cotton... or make two in your favorite worsted yarn and seam them into fingerless mitts!

pattern includes detailed instructions, photo tutorial, and access to video tutorials on my crocheters of awesome blog.

details include how to seam two squares into a potholder as well as how to seam two squares into fingerless mitts. both whipstitching and seaming with single crochet stitches are covered.

great for beginners, as are most of my patterns. 

created for the crochet class at knit cozy yarn shop in show low, az. hope to see you there!
